function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased medical waste generation during the pandemic, posing a risk to the environment and public health.","Impact":"Hazardous medical waste can lead to environmental pollution and public health risks if not managed properly.","Mitigation":"Improper disposal of medical waste must be prevented through proper management and disposal procedures.","Technologies":"Advanced waste management technologies can be utilized to safely dispose of medical waste.","People":"Public health and environmental safety are at risk.","Owner":"Health organizations, waste management authorities, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 among construction workers due to proximity in the work environment.","Impact":"The close proximity of construction workers can lead to an increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within construction projects.","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures and the use of face masks to reduce the risk of transmission.","Technologies":"Enforcement of social distancing protocols and the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) such as face masks and shields.","People":"Construction workers and related staff are at risk.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and health and safety authorities."}]}
